bot.messages

Class FileMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • bot.updates.Update
      • bot.messages.Message
        • bot.messages.FileMessage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioMessage

    public abstract class FileMessage
extends Message
    The basic informations a message containing a File always has.
